section.title: Joining PLD
Intro
section.para: If you decided to join PLD, you are welcome.
The first step is to subscribe development e-lists. You should obligatory subscribe general discuss list and optionally others.

section.title: E-lists for developers
section.para: We have separated traffic into a few lists, major discuss is kept on general devel lists:

listitem.para: pld-devel-en - general discuss for English speaking people
pld-devel-pl - general discuss for Polish speaking people

section.para: Remember to not disturb people on these lists with non technical problems, if you want to talk about PLD politics, join pld-discuss-pl - open for everyone who would like to express his opinions and flames.
The rest of lists are more specialized, dedicated for specific problems, multilanguage:

listitem.para: pld-installer - building the installer for PLD distro
pld-cvs-commits - by subscribing this list you can watch each change in CVS Repository
pld-kernel - these boys working on preparing linux kernel for our distro

section.title: Getting CVS Read-Write account
section.para: If you have already subscribed to devel e-list, and if you have idea how to do something concrete, you can ask for CVS Read-Write account. You have to ask CVS Administrator.
